properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM TB_RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM TB_RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_PATH, COUNT(L.LIKE_REFNO) AS LIKE_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH, P.PRODUCT_NO, R.POST_DATE FROM TB_RECIPE R left JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO left JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO left JOIN TB_LIKE L ON R.USER_NO = L.USER_NO left JOIN TB_CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_NO = R.CATEGORY_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH, M.USER_PATH, P.PRODUCT_NO, R.POST_DATE ) A ORDER BY A.POST_DATE DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_PATH, COUNT(L.LIKE_REFNO) AS LIKE_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH FROM TB_RECIPE R left JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO left JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO left JOIN TB_LIKE L ON R.USER_NO = L.USER_NO left JOIN TB_CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_NO = R.CATEGORY_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.CATEGORY_NO = ? GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH, M.USER_PATH
) A ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_PATH, COUNT(L.LIKE_REFNO) AS LIKE_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH FROM TB_RECIPE R left JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO left JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO left JOIN TB_LIKE L ON R.USER_NO = L.USER_NO left JOIN TB_CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_NO = R.CATEGORY_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%'|| ? ||'%' GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH, M.USER_PATH
) A ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, R.USER_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.RECIPE_INTRO, R.DIFFICULTY, R.SERVING, R.COOKING_TIME, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_PATH, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_LIKE WHERE LIKE_TYPE = 'R' AND LIKE_REFNO = ? ) LIKE_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH, P.PRODUCT_NO FROM TB_RECIPE R left JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO left JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO left JOIN TB_LIKE L ON R.USER_NO = L.USER_NO left JOIN TB_CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_NO = R.CATEGORY_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO, R.USER_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.THUMBNAIL_URL, R.DIFFICULTY, R.SERVING, R.COOKING_TIME, R.RECIPE_INTRO, M.USER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT_PRICE, P.PATH, M.USER_PATH, P.PRODUCT_NO ) A WHERE RECIPE_NO = ?

SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, RI.INGREDIENT_NAME, RI.INGREDIENT_AMOUNT, RI.INGREDIENT_UNIT, A.INGREDIENT_COUNT FROM ( SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, COUNT(*) AS INGREDIENT_COUNT FROM TB_RECIPE_INGREDIENT RI JOIN TB_RECIPE R ON RI.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO WHERE R.RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.RECIPE_NO = ? GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO ) A JOIN TB_RECIPE R ON R.RECIPE_NO = A.RECIPE_NO JOIN TB_RECIPE_INGREDIENT RI ON RI.RECIPE_NO = A.RECIPE_NO

SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, RS.STEP_NO, RS.STEP_CONTENT, RS.STEP_ATTACHMENT_URL, A.STEP_COUNT FROM ( SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, COUNT(*) AS STEP_COUNT FROM TB_RECIPE R JOIN TB_RECIPE_STEP RS ON RS.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO WHERE RS.STEP_STATUS ='Y' and R.RECIPE_NO= ? GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO ) A JOIN TB_RECIPE R ON R.RECIPE_NO = A.RECIPE_NO JOIN TB_RECIPE_STEP RS ON RS.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO ORDER BY RS.STEP_NO

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_ORDER_PRODUCT OP ON (OP.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TB_ORDER O ON (O.ORDER_NO = OP.ORDER_NO) WHERE ORDER_STATUS = 4 AND USER_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE ( RECIPE_NO , CATEGORY_NO , USER_NO , PRODUCT_NO , RECIPE_TITLE , THUMBNAIL_URL , RECIPE_INTRO , DIFFICULTY , SERVING , COOKING_TIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE_INGREDIENT ( RECIPE_NO , INGREDIENT_NAME , INGREDIENT_AMOUNT , INGREDIENT_UNIT ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE_STEP ( RECIPE_NO , STEP_NO , STEP_CONTENT , STEP_ATTACHMENT_URL ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL , SEQ_RSNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.CATEGORY_NO, R.RECIPE_TITLE FROM TB_ORDER_PRODUCT OP JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON OP.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO JOIN TB_ORDER O ON O.ORDER_NO = OP.ORDER_NO JOIN TB_RECIPE R ON R.CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.USER_NO = O.USER_NO
INSERT INTO TB_LIKE ( LIKE_NO , USER_NO , LIKE_TYPE , LIKE_REFNO ) VALUES ( SEQ_LNO.NEXTVAL , ? , 'R' , ? )
DELETE FROM TB_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND LIKE_REFNO = ? AND LIKE_TYPE = 'R'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_LIKE WHERE LIKE_TYPE = 'R' AND LIKE_REFNO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_LIKE VALUES( SEQ_LNO.NEXTVAL , ? , 'R' , ? , SYSDATE )
DELETE FROM TB_LIKE WHERE LIKE_TYPE = 'R' AND LIKE_REFNO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT LIKE_REFNO FROM TB_LIKE WHERE LIKE_TYPE = 'R' AND USER_NO = ?
